title: Hertz Posts Quarterly Profit on Travel Rebound
sub_head: Revenue climbed as leisure travel staged a comeback
body:
Hertz Global Holdings Inc. said it turned a profit for the third quarter as a continued rebound in leisure travel pushed its revenue higher.
The car-rental company Thursday posted net income attributable to Hertz of $605 million, compared with a loss of $222 million in the same period last year. Revenue rose about 76% to $2.23 billion.
